text: Cephaloziella is a genus of liverworts. Cephaloziella varians (Gottsche) Steph. is the only liverwort that occurs in the continental Antarctic. == Species == Cephaloziella divaricate * Cephaloziella acanthophora * Cephaloziella aenigmatica
